1: -module(line_SUITE).
    2: -include("public_transport.hrl").
    3: -include("logger.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl"). %% For assertion macros
    6: 
    7: -export([ get_next_stop_case/1
    8:         , get_other_end_case/1
    9:         , is_end_stop_case/1
   10:         , get_number_case/1
   11:         , contains_stop_case/1
   12:         , get_neighbors_case/1
   13:         , get_duration_case/1
   14:         , get_target_case/1
   15:         , get_intersection_case/1]).
   16: 
   17: -export([ all/0
   18:         , groups/0
   19:         , init_per_group/2
   20:         , end_per_group/2
   21:         , init_per_testcase/2
   22:         , end_per_testcase/2]).
   23: 
   24: all() ->
   25:   [ {group, three_stops}
   26:   , {group, four_stops}
   27:   , {group, five_stops}
   28:   , {group, nine_stops}
   29:   ].
   30: 
   31: groups() ->
   32:   [ { three_stops
   33:     , []
   34:     , [ get_next_stop_case
   35:       , get_other_end_case
   36:       , is_end_stop_case
   37:       , get_number_case
   38:       ]
   39:     }
   40:   , { four_stops
   41:     , []
   42:     , [ contains_stop_case
   43:       ]
   44:     }
   45:   , { five_stops
   46:     , []
   47:     , [ get_neighbors_case
   48:       , get_duration_case
   49:       , get_target_case
   50:       ]
   51:     }
   52:   , { nine_stops
   53:     , []
   54:     , [ get_intersection_case
   55:       ]
   56:     }
   57:   ].
   58: 
   59: init_per_group(three_stops, Config) ->
   60:   Stop1 = gen_server_mock:start(stop, stop1, strict),
   61:   Stop2 = gen_server_mock:start(stop, stop2, strict),
   62:   Stop3 = gen_server_mock:start(stop, stop3, strict),
   63:   Dur1_2 = 7,
   64:   Dur2_3 = 11,
   65:   Config ++ [ {stop1, Stop1}
   66:             , {stop2, Stop2}
   67:             , {stop3, Stop3}
   68:             , {dur1_2, Dur1_2}
   69:             , {dur2_3, Dur2_3}
   70:             ];
   71: 
   72: init_per_group(four_stops, Config) ->
   73:   Stop4 = gen_server_mock:start(stop, stop4, strict),
   74:   init_per_group(three_stops, Config) ++[{stop4, Stop4}];
   75: 
   76: init_per_group(five_stops, Config) ->
   77:   Stop5 = gen_server_mock:start(stop, stop5, strict),
   78:   Dur3_4 = 13,
   79:   Dur4_5 = 17,
   80:   init_per_group(four_stops, Config) ++ [ {stop5, Stop5}
   81:                                         , {dur3_4, Dur3_4}
   82:                                         , {dur4_5, Dur4_5}
   83:                                         ];
   84: 
   85: init_per_group(nine_stops, Config) ->
   86:   Stop6 = gen_server_mock:start(stop, stop6, strict),
   87:   Stop7 = gen_server_mock:start(stop, stop7, strict),
   88:   Stop8 = gen_server_mock:start(stop, stop8, strict),
   89:   Stop9 = gen_server_mock:start(stop, stop9, strict),
   90:   init_per_group(five_stops, Config) ++ [ {stop6, Stop6}
   91:                                         , {stop7, Stop7}
   92:                                         , {stop8, Stop8}
   93:                                         , {stop9, Stop9}
   94:                                         ];
   95: 
   96: init_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
   97:   Config.
   98: 
   99: 
  100: end_per_group(three_stops, Config) ->
  101:   Stop1 = ?config(stop1, Config),
  102:   Stop2 = ?config(stop2, Config),
  103:   Stop3 = ?config(stop3, Config),
  104:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Stop1)),
  105:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Stop2)),
  106:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Stop3)),
  107:   gen_server_mock:stop(Stop1),
  108:   gen_server_mock:stop(Stop2),
  109:   gen_server_mock:stop(Stop3);
  110: 
  111: end_per_group(four_stops, Config) ->
  112:   end_per_group(three_stops, Config),
  113:   Stop4 = ?config(stop4, Config),
  114:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Stop4)),
  115:   gen_server_mock:stop(Stop4);
  116: 
  117: end_per_group(five_stops, Config) ->
  118:   end_per_group(four_stops, Config),
  119:   Stop5 = ?config(stop5, Config),
  120:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Stop5)),
  121:   gen_server_mock:stop(Stop5);
  122: 
  123: end_per_group(nine_stops, Config) ->
  124:   end_per_group(five_stop, Config),
  125:   Stop6 = ?config(stop6, Config),
  126:   Stop7 = ?config(stop7, Config),
  127:   Stop8 = ?config(stop8, Config),
  128:   Stop9 = ?config(stop9, Config),
  129:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Stop6)),
  130:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Stop7)),
  131:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Stop8)),
  132:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Stop9)),
  133:   gen_server_mock:stop(Stop6),
  134:   gen_server_mock:stop(Stop7),
  135:   gen_server_mock:stop(Stop8),
  136:   gen_server_mock:stop(Stop9);
  137: 
  138: end_per_group(_Group, _Config) ->
  139:   ok.
  140: 
  141: 
  142: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  143:   put(id, ?MODULE),
  144:   put(module, ?MODULE_STRING),
  145:   logger:start_link(?MODULE_STRING ++ [$_|atom_to_list(TestCase)] ++ "_log"),
  146:   line_supervisor:start_link(),
  147:   Config.
  148: 
  149: 
  150: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  151:   logger:stop(),
  152:   Config.
  153: 
  154: 
  155: get_next_stop_case(Config) ->
  156:   Stop1 = ?config(stop1, Config),
  157:   Stop2 = ?config(stop2, Config),
  158:   Stop3 = ?config(stop3, Config),
  159:   Dur1_2 = ?config(dur1_2, Config),
  160:   Dur2_3 = ?config(dur2_3, Config),
  161:   Line = line_supervisor:start_line(1, [Stop1, Dur1_2, Stop2, Dur2_3, Stop3], bus),
  162: 
  163:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEXT_STOP(Line, Stop3, Stop1), {Stop2, Dur1_2}),
  164:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEXT_STOP(Line, Stop3, Stop2), {Stop3, Dur2_3}),
  165:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEXT_STOP(Line, Stop3, Stop3), none),
  166:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEXT_STOP(Line, Stop1, Stop3), {Stop2, Dur2_3}),
  167:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEXT_STOP(Line, Stop1, Stop2), {Stop1, Dur1_2}),
  168:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEXT_STOP(Line, Stop1, Stop1), none),
  169: 
  170:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line).
  171: 
  172: 
  173: get_other_end_case(Config) ->
  174:   Stop1 = ?config(stop1, Config),
  175:   Stop2 = ?config(stop2, Config),
  176:   Stop3 = ?config(stop3, Config),
  177:   Dur1_2 = ?config(dur1_2, Config),
  178:   Dur2_3 = ?config(dur2_3, Config),
  179:   Line = line_supervisor:start_line(1, [Stop1, Dur1_2, Stop2, Dur2_3, Stop3], bus),
  180: 
  181:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_OTHER_END(Line, Stop1), Stop3),
  182:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_OTHER_END(Line, Stop3), Stop1),
  183: 
  184:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line).
  185: 
  186: 
  187: is_end_stop_case(Config) ->
  188:   Stop1 = ?config(stop1, Config),
  189:   Stop2 = ?config(stop2, Config),
  190:   Stop3 = ?config(stop3, Config),
  191:   Dur1_2 = ?config(dur1_2, Config),
  192:   Dur2_3 = ?config(dur2_3, Config),
  193:   Line = line_supervisor:start_line(1, [Stop1, Dur1_2, Stop2, Dur2_3, Stop3], bus),
  194: 
  195:   ?assertEqual(true, line:?IS_END_STOP(Line, Stop1)),
  196:   ?assertEqual(false, line:?IS_END_STOP(Line, Stop2)),
  197:   ?assertEqual(true, line:?IS_END_STOP(Line, Stop3)),
  198: 
  199:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line).
  200: 
  201: 
  202: get_number_case(Config) ->
  203:   Stop1 = ?config(stop1, Config),
  204:   Stop2 = ?config(stop2, Config),
  205:   Stop3 = ?config(stop3, Config),
  206:   Dur1_2 = ?config(dur1_2, Config),
  207:   Dur2_3 = ?config(dur2_3, Config),
  208:   Line = line_supervisor:start_line(1, [Stop1, Dur1_2, Stop2, Dur2_3, Stop3], bus),
  209: 
  210:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NUMBER(Line), 1),
  211: 
  212:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line).
  213: 
  214: 
  215: contains_stop_case(Config) ->
  216:   Stop1 = ?config(stop1, Config),
  217:   Stop2 = ?config(stop2, Config),
  218:   Stop3 = ?config(stop3, Config),
  219:   Stop4 = ?config(stop4, Config),
  220:   Dur1_2 = ?config(dur1_2, Config),
  221:   Dur2_3 = ?config(dur2_3, Config),
  222:   Line = line_supervisor:start_line(1, [Stop1, Dur1_2, Stop2, Dur2_3, Stop3], bus),
  223: 
  224:   ?assertEqual(true, line:?CONTAINS_STOP(Line, Stop1)),
  225:   ?assertEqual(true, line:?CONTAINS_STOP(Line, Stop2)),
  226:   ?assertEqual(true, line:?CONTAINS_STOP(Line, Stop3)),
  227:   ?assertEqual(false, line:?CONTAINS_STOP(Line, Stop4)),
  228: 
  229:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line).
  230: 
  231: 
  232: get_neighbors_case(Config) ->
  233:   Stop1 = ?config(stop1, Config),
  234:   Stop2 = ?config(stop2, Config),
  235:   Stop3 = ?config(stop3, Config),
  236:   Stop4 = ?config(stop4, Config),
  237:   Stop5 = ?config(stop5, Config),
  238:   Dur1_2 = ?config(dur1_2, Config),
  239:   Dur2_3 = ?config(dur2_3, Config),
  240:   Dur3_4 = ?config(dur3_4, Config),
  241:   Dur4_5 = ?config(dur4_5, Config),
  242:   Line = line_supervisor:start_line(1, [Stop1, Dur1_2, Stop2, Dur2_3, Stop3, Dur3_4, Stop4, Dur4_5, Stop5], bus),
  243:   
  244:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEIGHBORS(Line, Stop1), [{Stop2, Dur1_2, Stop5, Line}]),
  245:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEIGHBORS(Line, Stop2), [{Stop1, Dur1_2, Stop1, Line}, {Stop3, Dur2_3, Stop5, Line}]),
  246:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEIGHBORS(Line, Stop3), [{Stop2, Dur2_3, Stop1, Line}, {Stop4, Dur3_4, Stop5, Line}]),
  247:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEIGHBORS(Line, Stop4), [{Stop3, Dur3_4, Stop1, Line}, {Stop5, Dur4_5, Stop5, Line}]),
  248:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_NEIGHBORS(Line, Stop5), [{Stop4, Dur4_5, Stop1, Line}]),
  249: 
  250:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line).
  251: 
  252: 
  253: get_duration_case(Config) ->
  254:   Stop1 = ?config(stop1, Config),
  255:   Stop2 = ?config(stop2, Config),
  256:   Stop3 = ?config(stop3, Config),
  257:   Stop4 = ?config(stop4, Config),
  258:   Stop5 = ?config(stop5, Config),
  259:   Dur1_2 = ?config(dur1_2, Config),
  260:   Dur2_3 = ?config(dur2_3, Config),
  261:   Dur3_4 = ?config(dur3_4, Config),
  262:   Dur4_5 = ?config(dur4_5, Config),
  263:   Line = line_supervisor:start_line(1, [Stop1, Dur1_2, Stop2, Dur2_3, Stop3, Dur3_4, Stop4, Dur4_5, Stop5], bus),
  264: 
  265:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop1, Stop2), Dur1_2),
  266:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop1, Stop3), Dur1_2 + Dur2_3),
  267:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop1, Stop4), Dur1_2 + Dur2_3 + Dur3_4),
  268:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop1, Stop5), Dur1_2 + Dur2_3 + Dur3_4 + Dur4_5),
  269:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop2, Stop3), Dur2_3),
  270:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop2, Stop4), Dur2_3 + Dur3_4),
  271:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop2, Stop5), Dur2_3 + Dur3_4 + Dur4_5),
  272:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop3, Stop4), Dur3_4),
  273:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop3, Stop5), Dur3_4 + Dur4_5),
  274:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop4, Stop5), Dur4_5),
  275: 
  276:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop2, Stop1), Dur1_2),
  277:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop3, Stop1), Dur1_2 + Dur2_3),
  278:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop4, Stop1), Dur1_2 + Dur2_3 + Dur3_4),
  279:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop5, Stop1), Dur1_2 + Dur2_3 + Dur3_4 + Dur4_5),
  280:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop3, Stop2), Dur2_3),
  281:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop4, Stop2), Dur2_3 + Dur3_4),
  282:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop5, Stop2), Dur2_3 + Dur3_4 + Dur4_5),
  283:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop4, Stop3), Dur3_4),
  284:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop5, Stop3), Dur3_4 + Dur4_5),
  285:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_DURATION(Line, Stop5, Stop4), Dur4_5),
  286: 
  287:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line).
  288: 
  289: 
  290: get_target_case(Config) ->
  291:   Stop1 = ?config(stop1, Config),
  292:   Stop2 = ?config(stop2, Config),
  293:   Stop3 = ?config(stop3, Config),
  294:   Stop4 = ?config(stop4, Config),
  295:   Stop5 = ?config(stop5, Config),
  296:   Dur1_2 = ?config(dur1_2, Config),
  297:   Dur2_3 = ?config(dur2_3, Config),
  298:   Dur3_4 = ?config(dur3_4, Config),
  299:   Dur4_5 = ?config(dur4_5, Config),
  300:   Line = line_supervisor:start_line(1, [Stop1, Dur1_2, Stop2, Dur2_3, Stop3, Dur3_4, Stop4, Dur4_5, Stop5], bus),
  301: 
  302:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_TARGET(Line, Stop1, Stop3), Stop5),
  303:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_TARGET(Line, Stop5, Stop3), Stop1),
  304:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_TARGET(Line, Stop3, Stop4), Stop5),
  305:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_TARGET(Line, Stop3, Stop2), Stop1),
  306: 
  307:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line).
  308: 
  309: 
  310: get_intersection_case(Config) ->
  311:   Stop1 = ?config(stop1, Config),
  312:   Stop2 = ?config(stop2, Config),
  313:   Stop3 = ?config(stop3, Config),
  314:   Stop4 = ?config(stop4, Config),
  315:   Stop5 = ?config(stop5, Config),
  316:   Stop6 = ?config(stop6, Config),
  317:   Stop7 = ?config(stop7, Config),
  318:   Stop8 = ?config(stop8, Config),
  319:   Stop9 = ?config(stop9, Config),
  320:   Line1 = line_supervisor:start_line(1, [Stop1, 5, Stop2, 5, Stop3], bus),
  321:   Line2 = line_supervisor:start_line(2, [Stop4, 5, Stop2, 5, Stop5], bus),
  322:   Line3 = line_supervisor:start_line(3, [Stop1, 5, Stop6, 5, Stop7], bus),
  323:   Line4 = line_supervisor:start_line(4, [Stop8, 5, Stop9, 5, Stop7], bus),
  324: 
  325:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line1, Line2), Stop2),
  326:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line2, Line1), Stop2),
  327:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line1, Line3), Stop1),
  328:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line3, Line1), Stop1),
  329:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line3, Line4), Stop7),
  330:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line4, Line3), Stop7),
  331: 
  332:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line1, Line4), none),
  333:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line4, Line1), none),
  334:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line2, Line3), none),
  335:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line3, Line2), none),
  336:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line2, Line4), none),
  337:   ?assertEqual(line:?GET_INTERSECTION(Line4, Line2), none),
  338: 
  339:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line1),
  340:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line2),
  341:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line3),
  342:   line_supervisor:stop_line(Line4).
